description: Framework to decode fractal neural map data from CSV

data_format.x_start: float - starting x-coordinate of the line segment
data_format.y_start: float - starting y-coordinate of the line segment
data_format.x_end: float - ending x-coordinate of the line segment
data_format.y_end: float - ending y-coordinate of the line segment
data_format.depth: int - recursion depth of the segment (higher means closer to origin)

interpreter_logic.depth_color_mapping: Map depth levels to visual layers or symbolic strata
interpreter_logic.segment_vector: Each line represents a directed symbolic branch from x_start,y_start to x_end,y_end
interpreter_logic.recursive_relation: Segments with lower depth values represent earlier or root branches in recursion
interpreter_logic.visual_mapping: Render using 2D coordinate plotting; optionally color-code by depth

usage: Inject CSV data into system using this schema for recursive visualization or symbolic trace synthesis
